name: Viral Suppression
description:
Disclaimer: This game was made in pure HTML, so I am sorry for the lack of music, artwork, and sound effects. Please don't judge too harshly when it comes to that. What do you expect from an HTML game? Anyway, enjoy!

Press 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, or 0 to change the difficulty.

Press R to restart.

Press WASD to move around.

Your mouse controls where people crowd to! If they get too close, they start to become infected. If they are too far away, they become lonely and fade away! Press the mouse to move them away.
